entry.title: Remote file inclusion
entry.summary: Remote file inclusion (RFI) What is RFI Remote file inclusion (RFI) is an attack targeting vulnerabilities in web applications that dynamically reference external scripts , so the hacker can host his web server in the client of the victim that’s to give him the power to do a lot of things : Code execution on the web server Executing client-side code like JavaScript that can lead to other ...
